title: Pixel 3aXL Stuck on 'G' Screen
content:
Pixel initially started freezing up unexpectedly this morning - camera app was repeatedly unresponsive 
Multiple resets did not fix the issue
Screen remains stuck at the G screen
Safe mode is not appearing as an option
This is the second time that this has happened - original issue occurred on the Pixel 1. I would prefer not to have to factory reset as that previously didn't fix this issue on the Pixel 1.
